title: 3 and Out - Andrew Whitworth on Retirement, McVay Impact, Goff/Stafford Transition, SB run
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Andrew Whitworth on Retirement, McVay Impact, Goff/Stafford Transition, SB run
description:
John is joined by former Rams All-Pro Tackle, Super Bowl champion and Walter Payton Man of the Year winner Andrew Whitworth to discuss if he's ruling out a comeback, how much the NFL has changed during his career, how he changed his approach as the league changed, what separates Sean McVay from other coaches, how he handled the transition from close friend Jared Goff to Matthew Stafford, how it all came together during the Rams Super Bowl run, and what it meant to be named Man of the Year.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
